title: Voodoo Master

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use your voodoo doll to curse people.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, use your voodoo doll to curse someone. This gives them any non-killing negative effect that can be found in another role/faction.
- You can kill your target, but this has a 2 night cooldown.
- With the Necronomicon, you can kill a target and curse another target every night.

desc:
Post 415
"That's right, I can use this voodoo doll to do anything to who it is bound to just by affecting this doll! ...What do you mean stab the doll, you think I'm going to destroy my hard work?"
